reviewHighlights.text: I’ve been playing Football Manager since 2004, easily 300+ hours every year. FM26 is the first time I genuinely feel disconnected from the series. The...
TL;DR - Abandon hope all ye who purchase here. No, this is not an upgrade from FM24 (nor FM23, nor FM22, nor FM21 tbh). Don't buy this game unless you...
